quote: Life can only be understood backwards but it must be lived forwards.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Experience: that most brutal of teachers. But you learn, my God do you learn.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: A man who carries a cat by the tail learns something he can learn in no other way.
name: Mark Twain

quote: It has been my experience that folks who have no vices have very few virtues.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: We are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience.
name: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Experience is one thing you can't get for nothing.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Man learns through experience, and the spiritual path is full of different kinds of experiences. He will encounter many difficulties and obstacles, and they are the very experiences he needs to encourage and complete the cleansing process.
name: Sai Baba

quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: Do you know the difference between education and experience? Education is when you read the fine print experience is what you get when you don't.
name: Pete Seeger

quote: Human beings, who are almost unique in having the ability to learn from the experience of others, are also remarkable for their apparent disinclination to do so.
name: Douglas Adams

quote: The years teach much which the days never know.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
name: Ralph Marston

quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
name: John W. Gardner

quote: A woman's life can really be a succession of lives, each revolving around some emotionally compelling situation or challenge, and each marked off by some intense experience.
name: Wallis Simpson

quote: I made decisions that I regret, and I took them as learning experiences... I'm human, not perfect, like anybody else.
name: Queen Latifah

quote: You cannot create experience. You must undergo it.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Everything has been said before, but since nobody listens we have to keep going back and beginning all over again.
name: Andre Gide

quote: When you have really exhausted an experience you always reverence and love it.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Nothing ever becomes real till it is experienced.
name: John Keats

quote: Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely.
name: Auguste Rodin

quote: Experience is the teacher of all things.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: If we could sell our experiences for what they cost us, we'd all be millionaires.
name: Abigail Van Buren

quote: Experience teaches only the teachable.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Experience enables you to recognize a mistake when you make it again.
name: Franklin P. Jones

quote: Bitter experience has taught us how fundamental our values are and how great the mission they represent.
name: Jan Peter Balkenende

quote: Experience - the wisdom that enables us to recognise in an undesirable old acquaintance the folly that we have already embraced.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Conviction without experience makes for harshness.
name: Flannery O'Connor

quote: Life is like playing a violin solo in public and learning the instrument as one goes on.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Experience without theory is blind, but theory without experience is mere intellectual play.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment.
name: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Experience is the child of thought, and thought is the child of action.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Deep experience is never peaceful.
name: Henry James

quote: Experience is a good school. But the fees are high.
name: Heinrich Heine

quote: All experience is an arch wherethrough gleams that untravelled world whose margin fades for ever and for ever when I move.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Skill is the unified force of experience, intellect and passion in their operation.
name: John Ruskin

quote: All that I know I learned after I was thirty.
name: Georges Clemenceau

quote: Every moment is an experience.
name: Jake Roberts

quote: Good judgment comes from experience and experience comes from bad judgment.
name: Fred Brooks

quote: There's a beauty to wisdom and experience that cannot be faked. It's impossible to be mature without having lived.
name: Amy Grant

quote: There are many truths of which the full meaning cannot be realized until personal experience has brought it home.
name: John Stuart Mill

quote: What one has not experienced, one will never understand in print.
name: Isadora Duncan

quote: The sky is the limit. You never have the same experience twice.
name: Frank McCourt

quote: The experience of God, or in any case the possibility of experiencing God, is innate.
name: Alice Walker

quote: The value of experience is not in seeing much, but in seeing wisely.
name: William Osler

quote: We are each responsible for all of our experiences.
name: Louise L. Hay

quote: There is nothing so easy to learn as experience and nothing so hard to apply.
name: Josh Billings

quote: My path has not been determined. I shall have more experiences and pass many more milestones.
name: Agnetha Faltskog

quote: My experiences have taught me a lot and I'm happy with my learnings, if not with what I went through to learn.
name: Ally Sheedy

quote: An optimist is a guy that has never had much experience.
name: Don Marquis

quote: Real love is a permanently self-enlarging experience.
name: M. Scott Peck

quote: Experience has taught me, when I am shaving of a morning, to keep watch over my thoughts, because, if a line of poetry strays into my memory, my skin bristles so that the razor ceases to act.
name: A. E. Housman

quote: Your experiences will be yours alone. But truth and best friendship will rarely if ever disappoint you.
name: Anne Lamott

quote: Experience is the only prophecy of wise men.
name: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: Experience is a great teacher.
name: John Legend

quote: Experience comprises illusions lost, rather than wisdom gained.
name: Joseph Roux

quote: All experience is an arch, to build upon.
name: Henry Adams

quote: Experiences are savings which a miser puts aside. Wisdom is an inheritance which a wastrel cannot exhaust.
name: Karl Kraus

quote: Few people even scratch the surface, much less exhaust the contemplation of their own experience.
name: Randolph Bourne

quote: The main thing experience has taught me is that one has to sort of hone their relationship to time, you know.
name: John Frusciante

quote: I think we are a product of all our experiences.
name: Sanford I. Weill

quote: Information's pretty thin stuff unless mixed with experience.
name: Clarence Day

quote: Most of the images of reality on which we base our actions are really based on vicarious experience.
name: Albert Bandura

quote: Everything is discursive opinion instead of direct experience.
name: A. R. Ammons

quote: Nothing which has entered into our experience is ever lost.
name: William Ellery Channing

quote: Color is an intense experience on its own.
name: Jim Hodges

quote: Judgment comes from experience - and experience comes from bad judgment.
name: Walter Wriston

quote: Not the fruit of experience, but experience itself, is the end.
name: Walter Pater

quote: Experience is not what happens to you it's what you do with what happens to you.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest Second, by imitation, which is easiest and third by experience, which is the bitterest.
name: Confucius

quote: One thorn of experience is worth a whole wilderness of warning.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: We gain strength, and courage, and confidence by each experience in which we really stop to look fear in the face... we must do that which we think we cannot.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.'
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature, nor do the children of men as a whole experience it. Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.
name: Helen Keller

quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Experience hath shewn, that even under the best forms of government those entrusted with power have, in time, and by slow operations, perverted it into tyranny.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: It was the experience of mystery - even if mixed with fear - that engendered religion.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Experience demands that man is the only animal which devours his own kind, for I can apply no milder term to the general prey of the rich on the poor.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Let us with caution indulge the supposition that morality can be maintained without religion. Reason and experience both forbid us to expect that national morality can prevail in exclusion of religious principle.
name: George Washington

quote: The more connections you and your lover make, not just between your bodies, but between your minds, your hearts, and your souls, the more you will strengthen the fabric of your relationship, and the more real moments you will experience together.
name: Barbara de Angelis

quote: I believe that anyone can conquer fear by doing the things he fears to do, provided he keeps doing them until he gets a record of successful experience behind him.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I don't believe people are looking for the meaning of life as much as they are looking for the experience of being alive.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: Like success, failure is many things to many people. With Positive Mental Attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order and prepare to try again.
name: W. Clement Stone

quote: If money is your hope for independence you will never have it. The only real security that a man will have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and ability.
name: Henry Ford

quote: Beliefs have the power to create and the power to destroy. Human beings have the awesome ability to take any experience of their lives and create a meaning that disempowers them or one that can literally save their lives.
name: Tony Robbins

quote: The marvelous richness of human experience would lose something of rewarding joy if there were no limitations to overcome. The hilltop hour would not be half so wonderful if there were no dark valleys to traverse.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Many people know so little about what is beyond their short range of experience. They look within themselves - and find nothing! Therefore they conclude that there is nothing outside themselves either.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Never, never and never again shall it be that this beautiful land will again experience the oppression of one by another.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: I had rather have a fool to make me merry than experience to make me sad and to travel for it too!
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: If history repeats itself, and the unexpected always happens, how incapable must Man be of learning from experience.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Experience teaches us that it is much easier to prevent an enemy from posting themselves than it is to dislodge them after they have got possession.
name: George Washington

quote: My experience has been that work is almost the best way to pull oneself out of the depths.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Unwearied ceaseless effort is the price that must be paid for turning faith into a rich infallible experience.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
name: Will Rogers

quote: I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death.
name: Robert Fulghum

quote: I am a woman in process. I'm just trying like everybody else. I try to take every conflict, every experience, and learn from it. Life is never dull.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Experience keeps a dear school, but fools will learn in no other.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Fame will go by and, so long, I've had you, fame. If it goes by, I've always known it was fickle. So at least it's something I experience, but that's not where I live.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: There are three methods to gaining wisdom. The first is reflection, which is the highest. The second is limitation, which is the easiest. The third is experience, which is the bitterest.
name: Confucius

quote: I probably hold the distinction of being one movie star who, by all laws of logic, should never have made it. At each stage of my career, I lacked the experience.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Sex without love is a meaningless experience, but as far as meaningless experiences go its pretty damn good.
name: Woody Allen

quote: A lot of people in our industry haven't had very diverse experiences. So they don't have enough dots to connect, and they end up with very linear solutions without a broad perspective on the problem. The broader one's understanding of the human experience, the better design we will have.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: It is a common experience that a problem difficult at night is resolved in the morning after the committee of sleep has worked on it.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: The wise are instructed by reason, average minds by experience, the stupid by necessity and the brute by instinct.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Experience, as a desire for experience, does not come off. We must not study ourselves while having an experience.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: To use the same words is not a sufficient guarantee of understanding one must use the same words for the same genus of inward experience ultimately one must have one's experiences in common.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Experience has shown, and a true philosophy will always show, that a vast, perhaps the larger portion of the truth arises from the seemingly irrelevant.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: What each must seek in his life never was on land or sea. It is something out of his own unique potentiality for experience, something that never has been and never could have been experienced by anyone else.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: I have but one lamp by which my feet are guided, and that is the lamp of experience.
name: Patrick Henry

quote: Genius is the ability to renew one's emotions in daily experience.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
name: Tony Robbins

quote: We should not look back unless it is to derive useful lessons from past errors, and for the purpose of profiting by dearly bought experience.
name: George Washington

quote: Take time to gather up the past so that you will be able to draw from your experience and invest them in the future.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Experience taught me a few things. One is to listen to your gut, no matter how good something sounds on paper. The second is that you're generally better off sticking with what you know. And the third is that sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
name: Donald Trump

quote: We learn from experience that men never learn anything from experience.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I don't have to have faith, I have experience.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: Men are wise in proportion, not to their experience, but to their capacity for experience.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: There can be no greater error than to expect, or calculate, upon real favors from nation to nation. It is an illusion which experience must cure, which a just pride ought to discard.
name: George Washington

quote: A failure is a man who has blundered, but is not able to cash in the experience.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: And so you touch this limit, something happens and you suddenly can go a little bit further. With your mind power, your determination, your instinct, and the experience as well, you can fly very high.
name: Ayrton Senna

quote: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: Is there anyone so wise as to learn by the experience of others?
name: Voltaire

quote: Our DNA is as a consumer company - for that individual customer who's voting thumbs up or thumbs down. That's who we think about. And we think that our job is to take responsibility for the complete user experience. And if it's not up to par, it's our fault, plain and simply.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: Sleep - the most beautiful experience in life - except drink.
name: W. C. Fields

quote: The joy of life consists in the exercise of one's energies, continual growth, constant change, the enjoyment of every new experience. To stop means simply to die. The eternal mistake of mankind is to set up an attainable ideal.
name: Aleister Crowley

quote: I have found little that is 'good' about human beings on the whole. In my experience most of them are trash, no matter whether they publicly subscribe to this or that ethical doctrine or to none at all. That is something that you cannot say aloud, or perhaps even think.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: I don't think I've ever worked so hard on something, but working on Macintosh was the neatest experience of my life. Almost everyone who worked on it will say that. None of us wanted to release it at the end. It was as though we knew that once it was out of our hands, it wouldn't be ours anymore.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: Take control of your consistent emotions and begin to consciously and deliberately reshape your daily experience of life.
name: Tony Robbins

quote: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: One of the greatest moments in anybody's developing experience is when he no longer tries to hide from himself but determines to get acquainted with himself as he really is.
name: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: You learn from a conglomeration of the incredible past - whatever experience gotten in any way whatsoever.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: Gratitude bestows reverence, allowing us to encounter everyday epiphanies, those transcendent moments of awe that change forever how we experience life and the world.
name: John Milton

quote: The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability.
name: Henry Ford

quote: You have people come into your life shockingly and surprisingly. You have losses that you never thought you'd experience. You have rejection and you have learn how to deal with that and how to get up the next day and go on with it.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: I'd rather have a lot of talent and a little experience than a lot of experience and a little talent.
name: John Wooden

quote: All growth is a leap in the dark, a spontaneous unpremeditated act without benefit of experience.
name: Henry Miller

quote: The best scientist is open to experience and begins with romance - the idea that anything is possible.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: DOS is ugly and interferes with users' experience.
name: Bill Gates

quote: Freedom. Freedom of religion. Freedom to speak their mind. Freedom to build a life. And yes, freedom to build a business. With their own hands. This is the essence of the American experience.
name: Mitt Romney

quote: Lying in bed would be an altogether perfect and supreme experience if only one had a colored pencil long enough to draw on the ceiling.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Death is not an event in life: we do not live to experience death. If we take eternity to mean not infinite temporal duration but timelessness, then eternal life belongs to those who live in the present.
name: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: It's an interesting combination: Having a great fear of being alone, and having a desperate need for solitude and the solitary experience. That's always been a tug of war for me.
name: Jodie Foster

quote: It's good to experience Hollywood in short bursts, I guess. Little snippets. I don't think I can handle being here all the time, it's pretty nutty.
name: Johnny Depp

quote: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers. It may not be difficult to store up in the mind a vast quantity of facts within a comparatively short time, but the ability to form judgments requires the severe discipline of hard work and the tempering heat of experience and maturity.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: The historical experience of socialist countries has sadly demonstrated that collectivism does not do away with alienation but rather increases it, adding to it a lack of basic necessities and economic inefficiency.
name: Pope John Paul II

quote: Love is an emotion that is based on an opinion of women that is impossible for those who have had any experience with them.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Women always excel men in that sort of wisdom which comes from experience. To be a woman is in itself a terrible experience.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Ages of experience have taught humanity that the commitment of a husband and wife to love and to serve one another promotes the welfare of children and the stability of society.
name: Jack Kingston

quote: Surely all art is the result of one's having been in danger, of having gone through an experience all the way to the end, where no one can go any further.
name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Every experience is a paradox in that it means to be absolute, and yet is relative in that it somehow always goes beyond itself and yet never escapes itself.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: If you wish to succeed in life, make perseverance your bosom friend, experience your wise counselor, caution your elder brother, and hope your guardian genius.
name: Joseph Addison

quote: Although nature commences with reason and ends in experience it is necessary for us to do the opposite, that is to commence with experience and from this to proceed to investigate the reason.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I know it's an experience that I need to have if God's putting me through it.
name: Lil Wayne

quote: In the business world, everyone is paid in two coins: cash and experience. Take the experience first the cash will come later.
name: Harold S. Geneen

quote: If merely 'feeling good' could decide, drunkenness would be the supremely valid human experience.
name: William James

quote: You are not a human being in search of a spiritual experience. You are a spiritual being immersed in a human experience.
name: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: How is it possible that a being with such sensitive jewels as the eyes, such enchanted musical instruments as the ears, and such fabulous arabesque of nerves as the brain can experience itself anything less than a god.
name: Alan Watts

quote: If you want to run, run a mile. If you want to experience a different life, run a marathon.
name: Emil Zatopek

quote: Each morning when I awake, I experience again a supreme pleasure - that of being Salvador Dali.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: Travel, in the younger sort, is a part of education in the elder, a part of experience.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: 'Pure experience' is the name I gave to the immediate flux of life which furnishes the material to our later reflection with its conceptual categories.
name: William James

quote: I've always enjoyed traveling and having experience with different cultures and different people. But it's also a wonderful thing to be able to benefit and enable research, not only in our country but around the world.
name: Laurel Clark

quote: Experience praises the most happy the one who made the most people happy.
name: Karl Marx

quote: From their experience or from the recorded experience of others (history), men learn only what their passions and their metaphysical prejudices allow them to learn.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: I think it's been hard for people to understand how Islam can be a good religion, and yet the Islamists are evil. Those of us who have had experience with Islam understand this, just as we understand the difference between snake handlers and people going to church on Sunday morning.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Going out and playing football or baseball with the boys, when I was a tomboy, was a great way to learn about winning and losing, and most girls didn't have that experience.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: When people speak to you about a preventive war, you tell them to go and fight it. After my experience, I have come to hate war.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: We deem those happy who from the experience of life have learnt to bear its ills without being overcome by them.
name: Carl Jung

quote: The essence of life is finding something you really love and then making the daily experience worthwhile.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: Taste every fruit of every tree in the garden at least once. It is an insult to creation not to experience it fully. Temperance is wickedness.
name: Stephen Fry

quote: In a person who is open to experience each stimulus is freely relayed through the nervous system, without being distorted by any process of defensiveness.
name: Carl Rogers

quote: Experience is what you have after you've forgotten her name.
name: Milton Berle

quote: Mistakes are painful when they happen, but years later a collection of mistakes is what is called experience.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: I'm not a genius. I'm just a tremendous bundle of experience.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: I know from personal experience how damaging it can be to live with bitterness and unforgiveness. I like to say it's like taking poison and hoping your enemy will die. And it really is that harmful to us to live this way.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: I experience a period of frightening clarity in those moments when nature is so beautiful. I am no longer sure of myself, and the paintings appear as in a dream.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: My own experience is use the tools that are out there. Use the digital world. But never lose sight of the need to reach out and talk to other people who don't share your view. Listen to them and see if you can find a way to compromise.
name: Colin Powell

quote: My mind withdrew its thoughts from experience, extracting itself from the contradictory throng of sensuous images, that it might find out what that light was wherein it was bathed... And thus, with the flash of one hurried glance, it attained to the vision of That Which Is.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Screaming at children over their grades, especially to the point of the child's tears, is child abuse, pure and simple. It's not funny and it's not good parenting. It is a crushing, scarring, disastrous experience for the child. It isn't the least bit funny.
name: Ben Stein

quote: Experience does not err. Only your judgments err by expecting from her what is not in her power.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Follow that will and that way which experience confirms to be your own.
name: Carl Jung

quote: Every secret of a writer's soul, every experience of his life, every quality of his mind is written large in his works.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: The act of birth is the first experience of anxiety, and thus the source and prototype of the affect of anxiety.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: In the revolt against idealism, the ambiguities of the word experience have been perceived, with the result that realists have more and more avoided the word.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: The deepest experience of the creator is feminine, for it is experience of receiving and bearing.
name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Experience is a revelation in the light of which we renounce our errors of youth for those of age.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Life has a certain flavor for those who have fought and risked all that the sheltered and protected can never experience.
name: John Stuart Mill

quote: The only thing we have learnt from experience is that we learn nothing from experience.
name: Chinua Achebe

quote: I like to think of my behavior in the sixties as a 'learning experience.' Then again, I like to think of anything stupid I've done as a 'learning experience.' It makes me feel less stupid.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Just as the wave cannot exist for itself, but is ever a part of the heaving surface of the ocean, so must I never live my life for itself, but always in the experience which is going on around me.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Enthusiasm - a distemper of youth, curable by small doses of repentance in connection with outward applications of experience.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: The wisdom of the wise and the experience of the ages are perpetuated by quotations.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterward.
name: Vernon Law

quote: Two things control men's nature, instinct and experience.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Experience has shown how deeply the seeds of war are planted by economic rivalry and social injustice.
name: Harry S. Truman

quote: In wisdom gathered over time I have found that every experience is a form of exploration.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: Experience which was once claimed by the aged is now claimed exclusively by the young.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Never become so much of an expert that you stop gaining expertise. View life as a continuous learning experience.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: We come altogether fresh and raw into the several stages of life, and often find ourselves without experience, despite our years.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: If you want to know the taste of a pear, you must change the pear by eating it yourself. If you want to know the theory and methods of revolution, you must take part in revolution. All genuine knowledge originates in direct experience.
name: Mao Zedong

quote: I didn't fully realize it at the time, but the goal of my life was profoundly molded by this experience - to help produce, in the next generation, more Mother Teresas and less Hitlers.
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: I've learned from experience that the greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions and not on our circumstances.
name: Martha Washington

quote: I just go where my heart tells me, where my gut tells me to go, where I'm enjoying my life the most, where I feel like I can have the most success. I've truly enjoyed my experience in NASCAR, to the point that I want to do it full time.
name: Danica Patrick

quote: The great awareness comes slowly, piece by piece. The path of spiritual growth is a path of lifelong learning. The experience of spiritual power is basically a joyful one.
name: M. Scott Peck

quote: I've learned from experience that if you work harder at it, and apply more energy and time to it, and more consistency, you get a better result. It comes from the work.
name: Louis C. K.

quote: It is impossible to experience one's death objectively and still carry a tune.
name: Woody Allen

quote: And to get real work experience, you need a job, and most jobs will require you to have had either real work experience or a graduate degree.
name: Donald Norman

quote: When you make a commitment to a relationship, you invest your attention and energy in it more profoundly because you now experience ownership of that relationship.
name: Barbara de Angelis

quote: What is the price of experience? Do men buy it for a song? Or wisdom for a dance in the street? No, it is bought with the price of all the man hath, his house, his wife, his children.
name: William Blake

quote: In times of rapid change, experience could be your worst enemy.
name: J. Paul Getty

quote: A few years' experience will convince us that those things which at the time they happened we regarded as our greatest misfortunes have proved our greatest blessings.
name: George Mason

quote: In order to experience everyday spirituality, we need to remember that we are spiritual beings spending some time in a human body.
name: Barbara de Angelis

quote: But human experience is usually paradoxical, that means incongruous with the phrases of current talk or even current philosophy.
name: George Eliot

quote: Is it not rather what we expect in men, that they should have numerous strands of experience lying side by side and never compare them with each other?
name: George Eliot

quote: In spite of his practical ability, some of his experience had petrified into maxims and quotations.
name: George Eliot

quote: I must take issue with the term 'a mere child,' for it has been my invariable experience that the company of a mere child is infinitely preferable to that of a mere adult.
name: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Most people go through life dreading they'll have a traumatic experience. Freaks were born with their trauma. They've already passed their test in life. They're aristocrats.
name: Diane Arbus

quote: Natural abilities are like natural plants, that need pruning by study and studies themselves do give forth directions too much at large, except they be bounded in by experience.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: No man's knowledge here can go beyond his experience.
name: John Locke

quote: To reach something good it is very useful to have gone astray, and thus acquire experience.
name: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: A conception not reducible to the small change of daily experience is like a currency not exchangeable for articles of consumption it is not a symbol, but a fraud.
name: George Santayana

quote: The reward of suffering is experience.
name: Harry S. Truman

quote: I deepen my experience of God through prayer, meditation, and forgiveness.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: I haven't been as wild with my money as somebody like me might have been. I've been very safe, very conservative with investments. I don't blow money. I don't have a ton of houses. I know things can go away. I've already had that experience.
name: Jim Carrey

quote: Let us be about setting high standards for life, love, creativity, and wisdom. If our expectations in these areas are low, we are not likely to experience wellness. Setting high standards makes every day and every decade worth looking forward to.
name: Greg Anderson

quote: The physical world, including our bodies, is a response of the observer. We create our bodies as we create the experience of our world.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: Difficult times always create opportunities for you to experience more love in your life.
name: Barbara de Angelis

quote: I think everyone should experience defeat at least once during their career. You learn a lot from it.
name: Lou Holtz

quote: Acting is a question of absorbing other people's personalities and adding some of your own experience.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: It is important to expect nothing, to take every experience, including the negative ones, as merely steps on the path, and to proceed.
name: Ram Dass

quote: The only relevant test of the validity of a hypothesis is comparison of prediction with experience.
name: Milton Friedman

quote: Studies perfect nature and are perfected still by experience.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: All theory is against freedom of the will all experience for it.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: The great difficulty in education is to get experience out of ideas.
name: George Santayana

quote: It is beyond a doubt that all our knowledge that begins with experience.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: I firmly believe that all human beings have access to extraordinary energies and powers. Judging from accounts of mystical experience, heightened creativity, or exceptional performance by athletes and artists, we harbor a greater life than we know.
name: Jean Houston

quote: But perhaps the rest of us could have separate classes in science appreciation, the wonder of science, scientific ways of thinking, and the history of scientific ideas, rather than laboratory experience.
name: Richard Dawkins

quote: The greatest gift is the passion for reading. It is cheap, it consoles, it distracts, it excites, it gives you knowledge of the world and experience of a wide kind. It is a moral illumination.
name: Moses Hadas

quote: The questions which one asks oneself begin, at least, to illuminate the world, and become one's key to the experience of others.
name: James A. Baldwin

quote: Suffering is but another name for the teaching of experience, which is the parent of instruction and the schoolmaster of life.
name: Horace

quote: Any experience can be transformed into something of value.
name: Vash Young

quote: As human beings, we are vulnerable to confusing the unprecedented with the improbable. In our everyday experience, if something has never happened before, we are generally safe in assuming it is not going to happen in the future, but the exceptions can kill you and climate change is one of those exceptions.
name: Al Gore

quote: To have God speak to the heart is a majestic experience, an experience that people may miss if they monopolize the conversation and never pause to hear God's responses.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: I wish I could give you a lot of advice, based on my experience of winning political debates. But I don't have that experience. My only experience is at losing them.
name: Richard M. Nixon

quote: A leader who confines his role to his people's experience dooms himself to stagnation a leader who outstrips his people's experience runs the risk of not being understood.
name: Henry A. Kissinger

quote: Reason, observation, and experience the holy trinity of science.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Everybody experiences far more than he understands. Yet it is experience, rather than understanding, that influences behavior.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: The statesman's duty is to bridge the gap between his nation's experience and his vision.
name: Henry A. Kissinger

quote: Tactics, fitness, stroke ability, adaptability, experience, and sportsmanship are all necessary for winning.
name: Fred Perry

quote: I gave my beauty and my youth to men. I am going to give my wisdom and experience to animals.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: Recommend virtue to your children it alone, not money, can make them happy. I speak from experience.
name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: The only faith that wears well and holds its color in all weathers is that which is woven of conviction and set with the sharp mordant of experience.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: I understand now that the vulnerability I've always felt is the greatest strength a person can have. You can't experience life without feeling life. What I've learned is that being vulnerable to somebody you love is not a weakness, it's a strength.
name: Elisabeth Shue

quote: When we learn from experience, the scars of sin can lead us to restoration and a renewed intimacy with God.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: The belief that all genuine education comes about through experience does not mean that all experiences are genuinely or equally educative.
name: John Dewey

quote: The trouble with this country is that there are too many politicians who believe, with a conviction based on experience, that you can fool all of the people all of the time.
name: Franklin P. Adams

quote: Whatever you dwell on in the conscious grows in your experience.
name: Brian Tracy

quote: I am so used to seeing the sort of play which deals with one man and two women. They do not leave me with the feeling I have made a full theatrical meal they do not give me the experience of the multiplicity of life.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: The historian must have some conception of how men who are not historians behave. Otherwise he will move in a world of the dead. He can only gain that conception through personal experience, and he can only use his personal experiences when he is a genius.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: Happiness isn't something you experience it's something you remember.
name: Oscar Levant

quote: No experience is a cause of success or failure. We do not suffer from the shock of our experiences, so-called trauma - but we make out of them just what suits our purposes.
name: Alfred Adler

quote: You cannot, in human experience, rush into the light. You have to go through the twilight into the broadening day before the noon comes and the full sun is upon the landscape.
name: Woodrow Wilson

quote: I don't claim to be knowledgeable about theology. Most of my knowledge comes out of my experience and the lessons in the Bible. Every Sunday I'm home I teach 45 minutes and we boiled them down to one page for the new book, 'Through the Year with Jimmy Carter.'
name: Jimmy Carter

quote: Anybody who has gone through a life-changing experience will tell you there is a different understanding of what is real and what is important, and when you are going through different moments, you can reflect and go, 'I have been through worse.'
name: Delta Goodrem

quote: The educator must believe in the potential power of his pupil, and he must employ all his art in seeking to bring his pupil to experience this power.
name: Alfred Adler

quote: My experience of the world is that things left to themselves don't get right.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: But if somebody dies, if something happens to you, there is a normal process of depression, it is part of being human, and some people view it as a learning experience etc.
name: Bob Geldof

quote: Optimism with some experience behind it is much more energizing than plain old experience with a certain degree of cynicism.
name: Twyla Tharp

quote: But my experience is that people who have been through painful, difficult times are filled with compassion.
name: Amy Grant

quote: Refusal to believe until proof is given is a rational position denial of all outside of our own limited experience is absurd.
name: Annie Besant

quote: There are worlds of experience beyond the world of the aggressive man, beyond history, and beyond science. The moods and qualities of nature and the revelations of great art are equally difficult to define we can grasp them only in the depths of our perceptive spirit.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: All partisan movements add to the fullness of our understanding of society as a whole. They never detract or, in any case, one must not allow them to do so. Experience adds to experience.
name: Alice Walker

quote: Many of the insights of the saint stem from their experience as sinners.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: As a medical doctor, it is my duty to evaluate the situation with as much data as I can gather and as much expertise as I have and as much experience as I have to determine whether or not the wish of the patient is medically justified.
name: Jack Kevorkian

quote: Good judgement comes from experience. Experience comes from bad judgement.
name: Jim Horning

quote: Experience seems to most of us to lead to conclusions, but empiricism has sworn never to draw them.
name: George Santayana

quote: The word experience is like a shrapnel shell, and bursts into a thousand meanings.
name: George Santayana

quote: Parents lend children their experience and a vicarious memory children endow their parents with a vicarious immortality.
name: George Santayana

quote: Because our entire universe is made up of consciousness, we never really experience the universe directly we just experience our consciousness of the universe, our perception of it, so right, our only universe is perception.
name: Alan Moore

quote: Masterpieces are not single and solitary births they are the outcome of many years of thinking in common, of thinking by the body of the people, so that the experience of the mass is behind the single voice.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: It takes someone with a vision of the possibilities to attain new levels of experience. Someone with the courage to live his dreams.
name: Les Brown

quote: Memory is not an instrument for exploring the past but its theatre. It is the medium of past experience, as the ground is the medium in which dead cities lie interred.
name: Walter Benjamin

quote: Throughout my whole life, as a performer, I've never played with a band. I've always played alone, so I was never required to stay in rhythm or anything. So it was a real different experience for me to start playing with a band. There were so many basic things for me to learn.
name: Steve Martin

quote: Experience is never limited, and it is never complete it is an immense sensibility, a kind of huge spider-web of the finest silken threads suspended in the chamber of consciousness, and catching every air-borne particle in its tissue.
name: Henry James

quote: All the suffering and joy we experience depend on conditions.
name: Bodhidharma

quote: Simplicity is the most difficult thing to secure in this world it is the last limit of experience and the last effort of genius.
name: George Sand

quote: Historically, musicians know what it is like to be outside the norm - walking the high wire without a safety net. Our experience is not so different from those who march to the beat of different drummers.
name: Billy Joel

quote: But although all our knowledge begins with experience, it does not follow that it arises from experience.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: It is possible to experience an awakening in this life through realising just how precious each moment, each mental process, and each breath truly is.
name: Christy Turlington

quote: What an artist is trying to do for people is bring them closer to something, because of course art is about sharing. You wouldn't be an artist unless you wanted to share an experience, a thought.
name: David Hockney

quote: You lose your individuality a huge amount when you have no money, and I certainly had that experience.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: At times I experience hardship in trying to find the proper point of balance between traditional things and my own personality.
name: Princess Masako

quote: Wisdom and penetration are the fruit of experience, not the lessons of retirement and leisure. Great necessities call out great virtues.
name: Abigail Adams

quote: That peace which is within us, we must experience it. And if we are searching for peace outside we will never find the peace within.
name: Prem Rawat

quote: Experience is the best teacher of all. And for that, there are no guarantees that one will become an artist. Only the journey matters.
name: Harry Callahan

quote: I'm afraid, based on my own experience, that fascism will come to America in the name of national security.
name: Jim Garrison

quote: The new spirituality is that it will produce an experience in human encounters in which we become a living demonstration of the basic spiritual teaching 'We are all one.'
name: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: There are some hurts that we experience that can be forgiven but we won't forget them.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: No place epitomizes the American experience and the American spirit more than New York City.
name: Michael Bloomberg

quote: To 'choose' dogma and faith over doubt and experience is to throw out the ripening vintage and to reach greedily for the Kool-Aid.
name: Christopher Hitchens

quote: Most men are very attached to the idea of being male, and usually experience a lot of fear and insecurity around the idea of being a man. Most women are very identified with their gender, and also experience a tremendous amount of fear and insecurity.
name: Andrew Cohen

quote: You don't know what unconditional love is. You may say you do, but if you don't have a child, you don't know what that is. But when you experience it, it is the most fulfilling ever.
name: Regina King

quote: I maybe had a first love and had my heart broken, but reflecting on it, I don't think that was love. I think as I'm getting older and having more in-depth relationships, maybe I'll experience it. At the moment, I don't know, exactly, if I've been in love.
name: Selena Gomez

quote: The traveler was active he went strenuously in search of people, of adventure, of experience. The tourist is passive he expects interesting things to happen to him. He goes 'sight-seeing.'
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Yes, I've been trepanned. That's quite an interesting experience, especially for my brain surgeon, who saw my thoughts flying around in my brain.
name: Keith Richards

quote: God is only a great imaginative experience.
name: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: Myth is an attempt to narrate a whole human experience, of which the purpose is too deep, going too deep in the blood and soul, for mental explanation or description.
name: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: No man was ever so completely skilled in the conduct of life, as not to receive new information from age and experience.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: There is no more lively sensation than that of pain its impressions are certain and dependable, they never deceive as may those of the pleasure women perpetually feign and almost never experience.
name: Marquis de Sade

quote: Music is your own experience, your own thoughts, your wisdom. If you don't live it, it won't come out of your horn. They teach you there's a boundary line to music. But, man, there's no boundary line to art.
name: Charlie Parker

quote: The dictum that truth always triumphs over persecution is one of the pleasant falsehoods which men repeat after one another till they pass into commonplaces, but which all experience refutes.
name: John Stuart Mill

quote: If you want plenty of experience in dealing with difficult people, then have kids.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: I had some experience in dealing with people who have mental illness and depression, but I didn't see the signs in myself. I couldn't ask for help because I didn't know I needed help.
name: Clara Hughes

quote: I write out of my intellectual experience.
name: Tom Stoppard

quote: It would be my guess that Madonna is not a very happy woman. From my own experience, having gone through persona changes like that, that kind of clawing need to be the center of attention is not a pleasant place to be.
name: David Bowie

quote: The great living experience for every man is his adventure into the woman. The man embraces in the woman all that is not himself, and from that one resultant, from that embrace, comes every new action.
name: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: High school is such a shared experience in North American culture.
name: Doug Coupland

quote: Imagine a judicial nominee said 'my experience as a white man makes me better than a Latina woman.' Wouldn't they have to withdraw? New racism is no better than old racism.
name: Newt Gingrich

quote: The experience of life consists of the experience which the spirit has of itself in matter and as matter, in mind and as mind, in emotion, as emotion, etc.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: But it's a journey and the sad thing is you only learn from experience, so as much as someone can tell you things, you have to go out there and make your own mistakes in order to learn.
name: Emma Watson

quote: Of two pleasures, if there be one which all or almost all who have experience of both give a decided preference, irrespective of any feeling of moral obligation to prefer it, that is the more desirable pleasure.
name: John Stuart Mill

quote: My friends, whoever has had experience of evils knows how whenever a flood of ills comes upon mortals, a man fears everything but whenever a divine force cheers on our voyage, then we believe that the same fate will always blow fair.
name: Aeschylus

quote: I think I'm basically the same guy I always was. Maybe I've learned, through experience, to rein in some of the anger and temper they say redheads normally have.
name: Willie Nelson

quote: Such happiness as life is capable of comes from the full participation of all our powers in the endeavor to wrest from each changing situations of experience its own full and unique meaning.
name: John Dewey

quote: War is delightful to those who have had no experience of it.
name: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: I never intended for the Monster Ball to be a religious experience, it just became one.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: I'm not one aspect of the human experience - none of us is.
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Common sense is the measure of the possible it is composed of experience and prevision it is calculation applied to life.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: A proverb is a short sentence based on long experience.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Experience teaches us to be most on our guard to protect liberty when the government's purposes are beneficent.
name: Louis D. Brandeis

quote: The wisdom of the wise and the experience of the ages is preserved into perpetuity by a nation's proverbs, fables, folk sayings and quotations.
name: William Feather

quote: Talking with you is sort of the conversational equivalent of an out of body experience.
name: Bill Watterson

quote: If you do build a great experience, customers tell each other about that. Word of mouth is very powerful.
name: Jeff Bezos

quote: If I could sell 500 million records every time, it would be great. But I've also had the luxury experience of having it when I was a teenager, in a very kind of model version of it.
name: Alanis Morissette

quote: A little reflection will show us that every belief, even the simplest and most fundamental, goes beyond experience when regarded as a guide to our actions.
name: William Kingdon Clifford

quote: This has been a learning experience for me. I also thought that privacy was something we were granted in the Constitution. I have learned from this when in fact the word privacy does not appear in the Constitution.
name: Bill Maher

quote: I sought my father in the world of the black musician, because it contained wisdom, experience, sadness and loneliness. I was not ever interested in the music of boys. From my youngest years, I was interested in the music of men.
name: Eric Clapton

quote: The trouble with learning from experience is that you never graduate.
name: Doug Larson

quote: The experience of democracy is like the experience of life itself-always changing, infinite in its variety, sometimes turbulent and all the more valuable for having been tested by adversity.
name: Jimmy Carter

quote: I got to experience soccer at the highest level at a young age I decided I wanted to be part of that for as long as possible.
name: Mia Hamm

quote: There is science, logic, reason there is thought verified by experience. And then there is California.
name: Edward Abbey

quote: The key to education is the experience of beauty.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: The greatest gift is a passion for reading. It is cheap, it consoles, it distracts, it excites, it gives you knowledge of the world and experience of a wide kind. It is a moral illumination.
name: Elizabeth Hardwick

quote: Experience is like a comb that life gives you when you are bald.
name: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: Sure, I suffered a lot. But it's not like the end of the world and it's not who I am. I lead quite a pleasant life and I'm able to divorce a perceived reality from my actual experience of life.
name: Ben Affleck

quote: I've never felt like I was in the cookie business. I've always been in a feel good feeling business. My job is to sell joy. My job is to sell happiness. My job is to sell an experience.
name: Debbi Fields

quote: Not to transmit an experience is to betray it.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: Normally, I love to go to the movies and when I see a character portrayed by different actors at different ages, it kind of pops a little bit for me. It brings me out of the movie experience. Now we have the technology to cure that.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: I just hope that theaters remain. I think there's something very wonderful about getting into a dark room with a bunch of people. There's something cool about that. Brings us all together in one room where we can experience all those emotions.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: Piano playing is a dying art. I love the fact that I can be one guy with one instrument evoking an emotional and musical experience.
name: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: Life is the only real counselor wisdom unfiltered through personal experience does not become a part of the moral tissue.
name: Edith Wharton

quote: We went with the St. Lawrence Experience, which is run by Joe Babbitt, who is a close friend now. We went out there for 10 days and we had the best week of our lives, and we've been going back since. We've been back three times now.
name: Tom Felton

quote: Working with big actors and realising that they were just normal people who've got an incredible talent was just a great experience.
name: Tom Felton

quote: Creativity comes from looking for the unexpected and stepping outside your own experience.
name: Masaru Ibuka

quote: It has been my experience that if we make the effort to listen to people when we meet them, and work to get to know them a little, it is then easy to find something likeable in practically anyone.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The great book for you is the book that has the most to say to you at the moment when you are reading. I do not mean the book that is most instructive, but the book that feeds your spirit. And that depends on your age, your experience, your psychological and spiritual need.
name: Robertson Davies

quote: We are different, in essence, from other men. If you want to win something, run 100 meters. If you want to experience something, run a marathon.
name: Emil Zatopek

quote: Parents of recovered children, and I've met hundreds, all share the same experience of doubters and deniers telling us our child must have never even had autism or that the recovery was simply nature's course. We all know better, and frankly we're too busy helping other parents to really care.
name: Jenny McCarthy

quote: Literature transmits incontrovertible condensed experience... from generation to generation. In this way literature becomes the living memory of a nation.
name: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quote: I don't care how smart a kid you are. The only way you learn what's not right is from experience.
name: Cameron Diaz

quote: I find, by experience, that the mind and the body are more than married, for they are most intimately united and when one suffers, the other sympathizes.
name: Lord Chesterfield

quote: Motherhood has completely changed me. It's just about like the most completely humbling experience that I've ever had. I think that it puts you in your place because it really forces you to address the issues that you claim to believe in and if you can't stand up to those principles when you're raising a child, forget it.
name: Diane Keaton

quote: There should be a sympathy with freedom, a desire to give it scope, founded not upon visionary ideas, but upon the long experience of many generations within the shores of this happy isle, that in freedom you lay the firmest foundations both of loyalty and order.
name: William E. Gladstone

quote: Poets are the only people to whom love is not only a crucial, but an indispensable experience, which entitles them to mistake it for a universal one.
name: Hannah Arendt

quote: In George Bush you get experience, and with me you get - The Future!
name: Dan Quayle

quote: In those days a concert was a personal experience. I wanted to be as close as possible to the audience, and of course big stadiums didn't enable you to do that. It wasn't my style.
name: Cat Stevens

quote: Any film, or to me any creative endeavour, no matter who you're working with, is, in many cases, a wonderful experience.
name: Martin Scorsese

quote: Very often I've known people who wouldn't say a word to each other, but they'd go to see movies together and experience life that way.
name: Martin Scorsese

quote: Working with HBO was an opportunity to experience creative freedom and 'long-form development' that filmmakers didn't have a chance to do before the emergence of shows like 'The Sopranos.'
name: Martin Scorsese

quote: Women love working together. That's my experience anyway.
name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: The amount of meetings I've been in - people would be shocked. But that's how you gain experience, how you can gain knowledge, being in meetings and participating. You learn and grow.
name: Tiger Woods

quote: Surfing soothes me, it's always been a kind of Zen experience for me. The ocean is so magnificent, peaceful, and awesome. The rest of the world disappears for me when I'm on a wave.
name: Paul Walker

quote: We are increasingly likely to find ourselves in places with background music. No composers have thought to write for these modern spaces, which represent 30% of our musical experience.
name: Brian Eno

quote: Sometimes you recognize that there is a category of human experience that has not been identified but everyone knows about it. That is when I find a term to describe it.
name: Brian Eno

quote: But inner experience is only one source of human knowledge.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Our wisdom comes from our experience, and our experience comes from our foolishness.
name: Sacha Guitry

quote: We can not continue to allow this over reliance on government to replace the cornerstone institution that has made the American experience possible.
name: Marco Rubio

quote: There are pros and cons of experience. A con is that you can't look at the business with a fresh pair of eyes and as objectively as if you were a new CEO. Fire yourself on a Friday night and come in on Monday morning as if a search firm put you there as a turn-around leader. Can you be objective and make the bold change?
name: Andrea Jung

quote: It is very easy to make clear what you want a film to say, but I did not wish to engage in overt propaganda, even for the right cause. I wanted to create an experience through the films, something where people could have the freedom of their own response to them.
name: Godfrey Reggio

quote: I would love to work in America. I wouldn't love to live there, but I'd love to experience working there.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: I had one relative who passed away but fortunately none others. So my sort of experience of it is quite limited, thankfully.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: I have such happy memories of performing in a choir and I don't think I'd have got where I am today without all that experience. So my advice to young singers is to either join your school or church's choir or find one in your local area. Choral music at any level teaches you so much about musicianship and blending your voice.
name: Katherine Jenkins

quote: As the leader of twelve apostles, even Jesus had more executive experience than Obama.
name: Ann Coulter

quote: Values are principles and ideas that bring meaning to the seemingly mundane experience of life. A meaningful life that ultimately brings happiness and pride requires you to respond to temptations as well as challenges with honor, dignity, and courage.
name: Laura Schlessinger

quote: If we didn't want to upset anyone, we would make films about sewing, but even that could be dangerous. But I think finally, in a film, it is how the balance is and the feelings are. But I think there has to be those contrasts and strong things within a film for the total experience.
name: David Lynch

quote: All I know is that history repeats itself and people are going to want to experience the world. But I know then they are going to have a better appreciation for what is here in Maine.
name: John Baldacci

quote: The simple act of saying 'thank you' is a demonstration of gratitude in response to an experience that was meaningful to a customer or citizen.
name: Simon Mainwaring

quote: I was so emotional. Choked up. I could hardly talk all day. I'll be cleaning out my trailer and saying goodbye soon, realizing what a wonderful experience this has been.
name: Dennis Franz

quote: Experience has taught me how important it is to just keep going, focusing on running fast and relaxed. Eventually it passes and the flow returns. It's part of racing.
name: Frank Shorter

quote: People of art should never get married and have children, because it's a selfish experience.
name: Mikhail Baryshnikov

quote: If you will call your troubles experiences, and remember that every experience develops some latent force within you, you will grow vigorous and happy, however adverse your circumstances may seem to be.
name: John Heywood

quote: You are about to have your first experience with a Greek lunch. I will kill you if you pretend to like it.
name: Jackie Kennedy

quote: Before people complain of the obscurity of modern poetry, they should first examine their consciences and ask themselves with how many people and on how many occasions they have genuinely and profoundly shared some experience with another.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: The character and history of each child may be a new and poetic experience to the parent, if he will let it.
name: Margaret Fuller

quote: I grew up like a neglected weed - ignorant of liberty, having no experience of it.
name: Harriet Tubman

quote: I would wish for any one of my colleagues to have the experience of working with Martin Scorsese once in their lifetime.
name: Daniel Day-Lewis

quote: It's my experience that you really can't lose when you try the truth.
name: Sharon Stone

quote: How do people relate to movies now, when they're on portable devices or streaming them? It's not as much about going to the movies. That experience has changed.
name: Keanu Reeves

quote: I had no expectations about fatherhood, really, but it's definitely a journey I'm glad to be taking. Number one, it's a great learning experience. When my mother told me it's a 24/7 job, she wasn't kidding.
name: Christopher Meloni

quote: Going to a party, for me, is as much a learning experience as, you know, sitting in a lecture.
name: Natalie Portman

quote: In our society, daily experience teaches the individual to want and need a never-ending supply of new toys and drugs.
name: Christopher Lasch

quote: A moment's insight is sometimes worth a life's experience.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: If someone is making a judgment when they don't have firsthand experience, it's intolerant. How can you make a judgment on something you don't know about?
name: Beck

quote: What is sure is that technological change is accelerating in all directions and, like children playing in a fountain, consumers are reveling in the experience.
name: Simon Mainwaring

quote: Corporate America cannot afford to remain silent or passive about the downward spiral we are undergoing. It cannot turn a blind eye to how difficult the experience of life is for so many of their customers.
name: Simon Mainwaring

quote: Ultimately, it's possible that social media platforms will be designed as templates that the users themselves customize in terms of the best way to express their community and experience of life, and brands will have to simply follow suit.
name: Simon Mainwaring

quote: How much do you as a consumer value a positive experience with a brand or its customer service department? How willing are you to share that with your friends? How inclined are you to let that person know that you're interaction with them was positive?
name: Simon Mainwaring

quote: Never, for the sake of peace and quiet, deny your own experience or convictions.
name: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: I've learned through experience that life is never that bad. The secret is just paying attention to how you feel and not letting anyone else dictate what in your heart you know is right.
name: Dana Plato

quote: Ends and purposes, whether they exist as conscious or subconscious tendencies, form the wrap and woof of our conscious experience.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: The immediacy of mystic experience simply means that we know God just as we know other objects. God is not a mathematical entity or a system of concepts mutually related to one another and having no reference to experience.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: I go by instinct - I don't worry about experience.
name: Barbra Streisand

quote: In my experience lust only ever leads to misery. All that suspicion and jealousy and anguish it unleashes. I don't want those things in my life.
name: Chrissie Hynde

quote: Every experience makes you a man.
name: Eric Cantona

quote: I've been playing against older and stronger competition my whole life. It has made me a better tennis player and able to play against this kind of level despite their strength and experience.
name: Maria Sharapova

quote: It took me years to understand that words are often as important as experience, because words make experience last.
name: William Morris

quote: Observation more than books and experience more than persons, are the prime educators.
name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: The more you are getting older, you lose a little something. Of course there is another advantage, because of your long experience you can use it.
name: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: Reasoning draws a conclusion, but does not make the conclusion certain, unless the mind discovers it by the path of experience.
name: Roger Bacon

quote: Proverbs are short sentences drawn from long experience.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Both expectations and memories are more than mere images founded on previous experience.
name: Samuel Alexander

quote: We are volcanoes. When we women offer our experience as our truth, as human truth, all the maps change. There are new mountains.
name: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: That's not to say that women's priorities are better than men's. Rather, when women are empowered, when they can speak from the experience of their own lives, they often address different, previously neglected issues. And families and whole communities benefit.
name: Dee Dee Myers

quote: Mississippi Mermaid was a very special experience because we only had the dialogues for the scenes we were shooting the night before.
name: Catherine Deneuve

quote: I don't think I even knew how big we were at the time. It was mad. I gained a lot through East 17 and I'm grateful for being able to have that experience.
name: Brian Harvey

quote: I loved the material when I first read it, and the experience of making the film was a great one. So when we came around to complete the trilogy, I just signed on board without even reading the scripts because the experience of the first film was so good.
name: Keanu Reeves

quote: I mean, if you didn't get it or if you didn't feel like you enjoyed it, sometimes that experience can change.
name: Keanu Reeves

quote: You may never learn the names of any of the people you talk to in a dog park, even after many, many hours spent there with them, and many hours of conversation. But if - knock on wood - anything should ever happen to your dog, these nameless non-strangers will rally, sympathize, offer to help, and hold your hand. I know this from experience.
name: Susan Orlean

quote: Living in a rural setting exposes you to so many marvelous things - the natural world and the particular texture of small-town life, and the exhilarating experience of open space.
name: Susan Orlean

quote: Parents, it seems, have an almost Olympian persistence when it comes to suggesting more secure and lucrative lines of work for their children who have the notion that writing is an actual profession. I say this from experience.
name: Susan Orlean

quote: Buying a car used to be an experience so soul-scorching, so confidence-splattering, so existentially rattling that an entire car company was based on the promise that you wouldn't have to come in contact with it.
name: Susan Orlean

quote: Sometimes I get so bold and I'm so confident about what I'm doing that I actually try to be more of a dork because it's a really liberating feeling to experience what it's like to not care.
name: John Mayer

quote: We experience problem-solving sessions as war zones, we view competing ideas as enemies, and we use problems as weapons to blame and defeat opposition forces. No wonder we can't come up with real lasting solutions!
name: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: I think each movie-making process is a very exhausting and satisfying and fulfilling experience for me.
name: Ang Lee

quote: I'm not a romantic. In life I didn't have much experience with romance.
name: Ang Lee

quote: So when you do your family tree and Margaret Cho does hers, and... Wanda Sykes and John Legend... we're adding to the database that scholars can then draw from to generalize about the complexity of the American experience. And that's the contribution that family trees make to broader scholarship.
name: Henry Louis Gates

quote: I can only speak from my own personal experience, being behind the camera and in front of it, but every magazine cover you see is completely airbrushed.
name: Janice Dickinson

quote: To most men experience is like the stern lights of a ship, which illuminate only the track it has passed.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: As for the forces, electromagnetism and gravity we experience in everyday life. But the weak and strong forces are beyond our ordinary experience. So in physics, lots of the basic building blocks take 20th- or perhaps 21st-century equipment to explore.
name: Edward Witten

quote: Bad experience is a school that only fools keep going to.
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: No 27-year-old has the experience to run a company that does a quarter of a billion dollars a year in sales.
name: Calvin Klein

quote: Breathe-in experience, breathe-out poetry.
name: Muriel Rukeyser

quote: Another way of judging the value of a prophet's religious experience, therefore, would be to examine the type of manhood that he has created, and the cultural world that has sprung out of the spirit of his message.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: The possibility of a scientific treatment of history means a wider experience, a greater maturity of practical reason, and finally a fuller realization of certain basic ideas regarding the nature of life and time.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: It's more fun to experience things when you don't know what's going to happen.
name: Louis C. K.

quote: Can advertising foist an inferior product on the consumer? Bitter experience has taught me that it cannot. On those rare occasions when I have advertised products which consumer tests have found inferior to other products in the same field, the results have been disastrous.
name: David Ogilvy

quote: In my experience, it is rarer to find a really happy person in a circle of millionaires than among vagabonds.
name: Thor Heyerdahl

quote: Sometimes when we weep in the movies we weep for ourselves or for a life unlived. Or we even go to the movies because we want to resist the emotion that's there in front of us. I think there is always a catharsis that I look for and that makes the movie experience worthwhile.
name: Edward Zwick

quote: There are such beings as vampires, some of us have evidence that they exist. Even had we not the proof of our own unhappy experience, the teachings and the records of the past give proof enough for sane peoples.
name: Bram Stoker

quote: If you sit in a position where decisions that you take would have a serious effect on people, you can't ignore a lot of experience around the world which says this drug has these negative effects.
name: Thabo Mbeki

quote: I think any spiritual experience that's worthwhile is not about ego and it will humble you in some way. And also, a Zen monk once said to me, 'If you're not laughing, then you're not getting it.'
name: David O. Russell

quote: The position that I take partly as a result of living in Asia is where you stop living according to your expectations and you become available to experience things as they are.
name: Martha Beck

quote: Truly charismatic people, in my experience, don't come along very often.
name: Francesca Annis

quote: The wonderful thing about acting is you move along with your decade. The older you get, the more interesting the parts you get to play and you bring more of your personal experience to the part.
name: Francesca Annis

quote: Everyone will experience the consequences of his own acts. If his act are right, he'll get good consequences if they're not, he'll suffer for it.
name: Harry Browne

quote: Going to the theater is such a joyous experience. My dad would take my sister and me to plays when we were very young, like six or seven years old.
name: Julia Roberts

quote: The soul is everlasting, and its learning experience is lifetime after lifetime.
name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: When a child comes in, I believe that it's a 'multipersonhood,' and it knows it, its consciousness knows it, and it has a nuclei in the center of its consciousness that is the repository of all experience and all knowledge. And when you look in the eyes of your baby and you feel this sense that they are an old soul, I believe indeed they are.
name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: Well, I think the main message is there is more to your story. There is more than what happens between the crib and the grave, and that is what I am really trying to speak to, this idea that all of life is this life and that there is nothing more than what we see and experience right here on this earth.
name: Max Lucado

quote: The biggest danger to the European Union comes not from those who advocate change, but from those who denounce new thinking as heresy. In its long history Europe has experience of heretics who turned out to have a point.
name: David Cameron

quote: I'm not trying to be romantic. I think you can tell when people are trying to be sexy onstage. When I was doing 'All the Way,' I was really thinking about my wife. People don't know my personal experience, but they can tell it's an honest interpretation.
name: Harry Connick, Jr.
